text: Or die from an ectopic pregnancy. https://t.co/EtFtUw1Rjk

author: Guardian_GM
text: Human rights override state’s rights. Judaism, the very basis of Christianity, is pro-abortion. Human hearts can be grown and beat in a Petri dish, so life does not begin with a heartbeat. Life begins with breath.

author: Guardian_GM
text: Why didn’t @democrats codify RVW into law before this? Because it made a good rallying cry to their base to energize the voters still with them.
